name: rdp-classifier
description:
The RDP Classifier is a naive Bayesian classifier that can rapidly and
accurately provides taxonomic assignments from domain to genus, with
confidence estimates for each assignment.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
Binary distribution of the IBM Java Software Development Kit for big and
little-endian powerpc (power7, 8 and 9). Note: IBM is fairly aggressive
about taking down old versions, so old (and even current) versions may
not be available.

dependent_to.name: py-pipits
dependent_to.description: Automated pipeline for analyses of fungal ITS from the Illumina
